summary: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.
cast: Jackie Chan|Lee Evans|Claire Forlani|Julian Sands|John Rhys-Davies|Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Christy Chung|Johann Myers|Alex Bao|Siu-Ming Lau|Diana C. Weng|Pok Fu Chow|Tat-Kwong Chan|Wai-Cheung Mak|Anthony Carpio|Bruce Khan|Nicholas Tse|Edison Chen|Scott Adkins|Matt Routledge|Reuben Langdon|Mark Strange|Hiro Hayama|Guanhua Han|Neilí Conroy|Billy Hill|Tara Leniston|Nikki Berwick|Paul Andreovski|Howard Gibbins|Rick Nathanson|Alfred Cheung|Mona Lynn|Kirk Trutner|Uri L. Schwarz|Ricardo Mamood-Vega|Matthew Sturgess|Chris Torres
title: El poder del talismán
